name: Easy Slow Cooker Chili
description: A hearty, set-it-and-forget-it chili with ground beef, beans, and spices, perfect for feeding a crowd.
cookTime: 45 mins, plus 6 to 8 hrs in the slow cooker

ingredients.item: ⅔ cup roasted red peppers, medium dice
1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt, plus more as needed
2 (15-ounce) cans kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1/4 cup coarsely chopped pickled jalapeños or green chiles, drained

instructions: Heat the oil in a large frying pan over medium heat until shimmering.
Add the onions and bell pepper, season with salt
cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 8 minutes.
Add the garlic, chili powder, and cumin, stir to coat the vegetables
Add the ground beef and measured salt
Cook, breaking the meat into small pieces with a wooden spoon or spatula, until the beef is no longer pink, about 7 minutes.
Transfer the mixture to the slow cooker,
Add the diced tomatoes and their juices, tomato sauce, and beans
Cover and cook until the chili thickens and the flavors meld, about 8 hours on low or 6 hours on high.
Stir in the jalapeños or green chiles.
Taste and season with salt as needed
serve with the cheese, scallions, and sour cream.
